siteMetadata.title: Catalog of Archived Suborbital Earth Science Investigations
siteMetadata.description: NASA's collection of suborbital field campaigns: airborne, marine, mobile, and stationary.
siteMetadata.author: @developmentseed
siteMetadata.siteDefinition: NASA | CASEI is a comprehensive inventory containing information about all airborne and field campaigns as well as aircrafts, instruments, and data products.
